meanings.definition: Relating to or involving the transfer of emotions or feelings from one person to another.
meanings.sent1: Her transferential hug made me feel happy and loved.
meanings.sent2: The therapist noticed the transferential bond between the patient and caregiver.
meanings.sent3: The transferential connection between the characters in the movie was heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: Their transferential relationship was like a bridge of understanding between them.
meanings.sent5: The transferential impact of the music resonated deeply within me.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the process of transferring something from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: The transferential service ensured the safe delivery of the package.
meanings.sent2: We used a transferential method to move the furniture to the new house.
meanings.sent3: The transferential journey of the goods had a few unexpected detours.
meanings.sent4: The transferential movement of the goods was swift and efficient.
meanings.sent5: The transferential process of data transfer was completed without any errors.
